faqs.question: How often will my jobs run on Android?
faqs.answer: If Doze is enabled, the reschedule period is not guaranteed to be an average of 15 mins. It may be much longer.

faqs.question: When should I register my jobs? Should I do everytime I start the app
faqs.answer: The best is to register your jobs with the Shiny startup

faqs.question: How long do I have to run a job?
faqs.answer: On iOS, 30 seconds - not a penny more.  Android will give you several minutes depending on the device, OS version, etc
